name: Send Tax Deduction Receipt for Charitable Donations
description: Send shoppers an email receipt when they make a tax deductible charitable donation at checkout.

metadata.subject: Thank you for your donation!
metadata.message:
Dear {{shopify_order.customer.first_name}} {{shopify_order.customer.last_name}}, 

Thank you for your gift of ${{shopify_order.total_tip_received}}, received on {{shopify_order.created_at}}.

Your donation is to a tax-exempt nonprofit organization under Section 501(c)3 of the Internal Revenue Code. You can deduct the full amount of your gift as a charitable contribution for federal income tax purposes. No goods or services were provided in exchange for your contribution.

Sincerely,
{{context.shop.name}}
